verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निमीळे पुरोहितं यज्ञस्य देवम् रत्वीजम् । होतारं रत्नधातमम् ॥
verses.transliteration: agnim īḷe purohitaṃ yajñasya devam ṛtvījam | hotāraṃ ratnadhātamam ||
verses.translation_english: I praise Agni, the chosen Priest, God, minister of the sacrifice, the Hotar, bestower of treasures.

verses.transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir uta chetaso dviśas tiṣṭhati dhruvam |
verses.translation_english: Agni, attended by the ancient seers, stands firmly with steadfast mind.

verses.sanskrit_text: सहस्रं रश्मिं विधाता यजमानं हृदि ध्रुवम् ।
verses.transliteration: sahasraṃ raśmiṃ vidhātā yajamānaṃ hṛdi dhruvam |
verses.translation_english: The arranger of the thousandfold rays establishes the sacrificer firmly in his heart.

verses.transliteration: agnir devanāṃ purohitaṃ yajñasya viśvavedyaḥ |
verses.translation_english: Agni, the priest of the gods, known to all, who comprehends the entire sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो देवो रत्नधातुर्दिवि पर्वतः सविता ।
verses.transliteration: sa no devo ratnadhātur divi parvataḥ savitā |
verses.translation_english: May that God, bestower of treasures, who is in heaven and on the mountains, shine upon us.

verses.transliteration: agnir hotā devasya yajñasya ratnadhātuḥ |
verses.translation_english: Agni is the priest of the gods, the giver of wealth, and the sustainer of the sacrifice.

verses.transliteration: sahasraśo 'gnir mahati yajamānaṃ purohitam |
verses.translation_english: Agni, mighty and manifold, serves as the priest of the sacrificer.

verses.transliteration: agnir hi devānāma ahnoḥ samprajāyata yajamānam |
verses.translation_english: Indeed Agni, of the gods, arises each day for the benefit of the sacrificer.

verses.transliteration: sa no devo ratnadhātur yajñasya purohitaḥ |
verses.translation_english: May that God, bestower of treasures, be our priest in the sacrifice.

verses.transliteration: agnir hotā devasya yajamānaṃ hṛdi sthiram |
verses.translation_english: Agni, the priest of the gods, establishes the sacrificer firmly in his heart.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः पूर्वेभिरुत चेतसो द्रुहसि वसते हि यज्ञे ।
verses.transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir uta chetaso druḥasi vasate hi yajñe |
verses.translation_english: Agni, attended by the ancient seers, dwells firmly in the mind during the sacrifice.

verses.transliteration: agnir hotā devasya yajñasya viśvavedyaḥ |
verses.translation_english: Agni is the priest of the gods, all-knowing, and comprehends the entire sacrifice.

verses.transliteration: agnir medhāṃ purohitaṃ yajñasya ratnadhātuḥ |
verses.translation_english: Agni, the wise priest, is the bestower of treasures in the sacrifice.

verses.transliteration: sa no devo ratnadhātur yajñasya purohitaḥ |
verses.translation_english: May that God, bestower of treasures, be our priest in the sacrifice.

verses.transliteration: agnir hotā devasya yajamānaṃ hṛdi sthiram |
verses.translation_english: Agni, the priest of the gods, establishes the sacrificer firmly in his heart.

verses.transliteration: agnir mahatā sahasreṇa yajamānaṃ purohitam |
verses.translation_english: Agni, mighty and manifold, serves as the priest of the sacrificer.

verses.transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir uta chetaso dviśas tiṣṭhati dhruvam |
verses.translation_english: Agni, attended by the ancient seers, stands steadfastly with mind fixed.

verses.transliteration: agnir hotā devasya yajñasya ratnadhātuḥ |
verses.translation_english: Agni is the priest of the gods, the giver of wealth, and the sustainer of the sacrifice.

verses.transliteration: sa no devo ratnadhātur yajamānaṃ purohitaḥ |
verses.translation_english: May that God, bestower of treasures, be our priest in the sacrifice.

verses.transliteration: agnir hotā devasya yajamānaṃ hṛdi sthiram |
verses.translation_english: Agni, the priest of the gods, establishes the sacrificer firmly in his heart.
